title: 1.7.10崩溃
author: Tranquil
txt_content:

replies.author: 飞翔之歌
replies.txt_content: 放出模组列表以及Forge版本

replies.author: Tranquil
replies.txt_content: forge崩溃后我吧forge也删了，只有纯净，还是崩溃

replies.txt_content:
Tranquil 发表于 2020-4-21 21:58
崩溃报告是纯净1.7.10的
建议重装

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content: 尝试在视频设置中将区块渲染距离设置到8或者更低；或者删除options.txt
